response.overview: My girlfriends and I belong to a very private club. No membership fee, just one strict rule: we must fuck a stud every time hubby goes out of town. That's what it is, a club of cheating wives. I am the biggest slut of the bunch. I'll do everything in excess when I have sex with whoever I choose for a one-night stand. My friend Mischel is more concerned about privacy. She doesn't want to get caught. She fucks a MD at his office. He's a kind of pervert, but as she says he gives her the best anal sex she ever experimented. Lady is so gorgeous. She can get a man anytime she wants thanks to that incredible rack she has. And there is Evelin. With her slender elegant body who would believe that she's just a freak for anal. All her lover has to do is take her in the back door to have her scream and moan in ecstasy. We're all so naughty, but we won't get caught! And when hubby comes home we're so full of love and tenderness for him.
response.title: Married But Horny 8
